Package datastorage

package datastorage
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    DAO<T>
     
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CaregiverDAO
    This class is used to access the database and to store the data related to Caregivers.
    ConnectionBuilder
    This class is used to create a connection to the database.
    DAOFactory
    This class is a singleton that provides access to the DAO objects.
    DAOimp<T>
    Abstract class that is used to access the database and retrieve data from it.
    PatientDAO
    Implements the Interface DAOImp.
    PersonDAO
    This class is used to access the database and retrieve data from it regarding the persons.
    TreatmentDAO
    Class that handles the database operations for the treatment table.
    TreatmentTypeDAO
    This class is used to access the TreatmentType table in the database.
    UserDAO
    This class is used to access the User table in the database.
